page.title: 06CLUBS, West Cambs.
page.content:
Clubs, Societies and Associations, both within the villages and further afield, cater for all ages.
Youngest attend Mother + Toddler Group and Playgroup, both held in special building at Brington School. Catworth Playing Field Pavilion is base for Youth Club - up to 14 year olds - and Village Hall for Carpet Bowls Club, just being formed. Over-60s meet at Bythorn. Cricket team at Leighton Brom swold, football at Catworth. Lack of support closed Tennis Club, Catworth 1980s but court still at Playing Field
Women's groups include WI (Catworth) - Village Hall; Housewives Register meet informally in members' homes.
For further afield, see RECREATION
